verses.verse: וְהַנַּ֧עַר <WH5288> And the child שְׁמוּאֵ֛ל <WH8050> Samuel מְשָׁרֵ֥ת <WH8334> ministered אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before עֵלִ֑י <WH5941> Eli וּדְבַר־ <WH1697> And the word יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become יָקָר֙ <WH3368> was precious בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> in those days הָהֵ֔ם <WH1992> those אֵ֥ין <WH369> else חָז֖וֹן <WH2377> vision נִפְרָֽץ׃ <WH6555> [there was] no open ס

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> happened בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it came to pass at that time הַה֔וּא <WH1931> as וְעֵלִ֖י <WH5941> when Eli שֹׁכֵ֣ב <WH7901> [was] laid down בִּמְקֹמ֑וֹ <WH4725> in his place [וְעֵינֹו כ] (וְעֵינָיו֙ <WH5869> affliction ק) הֵחֵ֣לּוּ <WH2490> began כֵה֔וֹת <WH3544> to wax dim לֹ֥א <WH3808> he יוּכַ֖ל <WH3201> [that] he could לִרְאֽוֹת׃ <WH7200> not see

וְנֵ֤ר <WH5216> And ere the lamp אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of God טֶ֣רֶם <WH2962> yet יִכְבֶּ֔ה <WH3518> went out וּשְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <WH8050> [was] and Samuel שֹׁכֵ֑ב <WH7901> was laid down בְּהֵיכַ֣ל <WH1964> in the temple יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> in it אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> where the ark אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God פ
וַיִּקְרָ֧א <WH7121> called יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> That the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> about שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <WH8050> Samuel וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> and he answered הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <WH2005> behold

וַיָּ֣רָץ <WH7323> And he ran אֶל־ <WH413> to עֵלִ֗י <WH5941> unto Eli וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> and said הִנְנִי֙ <WH2005> behold כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for קָרָ֣אתָ <WH7121> for thou calledst לִּ֔י וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> me And he said לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not קָרָ֖אתִי <WH7121> I called שׁ֣וּב <WH7725> again שְׁכָ֑ב <WH7901> not lie down וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> went וַיִּשְׁכָּֽב׃ <WH7901> and lay down ס

וַיֹּ֣סֶף <WH3254> yet again יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> And the LORD קְרֹ֣א <WH7121> called עוֹד֮ <WH5750> yet שְׁמוּאֵל֒ <WH8050> Samuel וַיָּ֤קָם <WH6965> arose שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <WH8050> And Samuel וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> and went אֶל־ <WH413> to עֵלִ֔י <WH5941> to Eli וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said הִנְנִ֔י <WH2005> behold כִּ֥י <WH3588> for קָרָ֖אתָ <WH7121> Here [am] I for thou didst call לִ֑י וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> me And he answered לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not קָרָ֥אתִי <WH7121> I called בְנִ֖י <WH1121> not my son שׁ֥וּב <WH7725> again שְׁכָֽב׃ <WH7901> lie down

וּשְׁמוּאֵ֕ל <WH8050> Now Samuel טֶ֖רֶם <WH2962> did not yet יָדַ֣ע <WH3045> know אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְטֶ֛רֶם <WH2962> nor יִגָּלֶ֥ה <WH1540> yet revealed אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> about דְּבַר־ <WH1697> neither was the word יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיֹּ֨סֶף <WH3254> again יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> And the LORD קְרֹא־ <WH7121> called שְׁמוּאֵל֮ <WH8050> Samuel בַּשְּׁלִשִׁית֒ <WH7992> the third time וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <WH6965> And he arose וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> and went אֶל־ <WH413> to עֵלִ֔י <WH5941> to Eli וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said הִנְנִ֔י <WH2005> behold כִּ֥י <WH3588> for קָרָ֖אתָ <WH7121> Here [am] I for thou didst call לִ֑י וַיָּ֣בֶן <WH995> perceived עֵלִ֔י <WH5941> me And Eli כִּ֥י <WH3588> that יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that the LORD קֹרֵ֥א <WH7121> had called לַנָּֽעַר׃ <WH5288> the child

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said עֵלִ֣י <WH5941> Therefore Eli לִשְׁמוּאֵל֮ <WH8050> unto Samuel לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> Go שְׁכָב֒ <WH7901> lie down וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> become אִם־ <WH518> shall be if יִקְרָ֣א <WH7121> and it shall be if he call אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> about וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <WH559> thee that thou shalt say דַּבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> Speak יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> LORD כִּ֥י <WH3588> for שֹׁמֵ֖עַ <WH8085> heareth עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> for thy servant וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> went שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> So Samuel וַיִּשְׁכַּ֖ב <WH7901> and lay down בִּמְקוֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH4725> in his place

וַיָּבֹ֤א <WH935> came יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD וַיִּתְיַצַּ֔ב <WH3320> and stood וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and called כְפַֽעַם־ <WH6471> as at other times בְּפַ֖עַם <WH6471> times שְׁמוּאֵ֣ל ׀ <WH8050> Samuel שְׁמוּאֵ֑ל <WH8050> Samuel וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> answered שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <WH8050> Then Samuel דַּבֵּ֔ר <WH1696> Speak כִּ֥י <WH3588> for שֹׁמֵ֖עַ <WH8085> heareth עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5650> for thy servant פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> to Samuel הִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> Behold אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I עֹשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> Behold I will do דָבָ֖ר <WH1697> a thing בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> in Israel אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which כָּל־ <WH3605> of everyone שֹׁ֣מְע֔וֹ <WH8085> of every one that heareth תְּצִלֶּ֖ינָה <WH6750> it shall tingle שְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> at which both אָזְנָֽיו׃ <WH241> the ears

בַּיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַהוּא֙ <WH1931> I אָקִ֣ים <WH6965> I will perform אֶל־ <WH413> concerning עֵלִ֔י <WH5941> against Eli אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> i דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <WH1696> all [things] which I have spoken אֶל־ <WH413> concerning בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> his house הָחֵ֖ל <WH2490> when I begin וְכַלֵּֽה׃ <WH3615> I will also make an end

וְהִגַּ֣דְתִּי <WH5046> For I have told ל֔וֹ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because שֹׁפֵ֥ט <WH8199> him that I will judge אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּית֖וֹ <WH1004> his house עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> ever בַּעֲוֹ֣ן <WH5771> for the iniquity אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יָדַ֗ע <WH3045> which he knoweth כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because מְקַֽלְלִ֤ים <WH7043> made themselves vile לָהֶם֙ <WH1992> themselves בָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> because his sons וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not כִהָ֖ה <WH3543> and he restrained בָּֽם׃

וְלָכֵ֥ן <WH3651> Therefore נִשְׁבַּ֖עְתִּי <WH7650> And therefore I have sworn לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> unto the house עֵלִ֑י <WH5941> of Eli אִֽם־ <WH518> lo יִתְכַּפֵּ֞ר <WH3722> shall not be purged עֲוֹ֧ן <WH5771> that the iniquity בֵּית־ <WH1004> house עֵלִ֛י <WH5941> of Eli's בְּזֶ֥בַח <WH2077> with sacrifice וּבְמִנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> nor offering עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <WH7901> lay שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <WH8050> And Samuel עַד־ <WH5704> until הַבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> until the morning וַיִּפְתַּ֖ח <WH6605> and opened אֶת־ <WH853> דַּלְת֣וֹת <WH1817> the doors בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּשְׁמוּאֵ֣ל <WH8050> And Samuel יָרֵ֔א <WH3372> feared מֵהַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> to shew אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּרְאָ֖ה <WH4759> the vision אֶל־ <WH413> to עֵלִֽי׃ <WH5941> Eli

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> called עֵלִי֙ <WH5941> Then Eli אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> Samuel וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and said שְׁמוּאֵ֣ל <WH8050> Samuel בְּנִ֑י <WH1121> my son וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he answered הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <WH2005> behold

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said מָ֤ה <WH4100> What הַדָּבָר֙ <WH1697> What [is] the thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> that [the LORD] hath said אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> about אַל־ <WH408> nay נָ֥א <WH4994> Please תְכַחֵ֖ד <WH3582> unto thee? I pray thee hide מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> at כֹּ֣ה <WH3541> so יַעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> do so לְּךָ֤ אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> [it] not from me God וְכֹ֣ה <WH3541> also יוֹסִ֔יף <WH3254> to thee and more also אִם־ <WH518> if תְּכַחֵ֤ד <WH3582> if thou hide מִמֶּ֙נִּי֙ <WH4480> at דָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> [any] thing מִכָּל־ <WH3605> of all הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> from me of all the things אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> he דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> that he said אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> about

וַיַּגֶּד־ <WH5046> told ל֤וֹ שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <WH8050> And Samuel אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> everything הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> him every whit וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nothing כִחֵ֖ד <WH3582> and hid מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> and he וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <WH559> nothing from him And he said יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> It [is] the LORD ה֔וּא <WH1931> he הַטּ֥וֹב <WH2896> him good בְּעֵינָ֖ו <WH5869> what seemeth יַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> let him do פ

וַיִּגְדַּ֖ל <WH1431> grew שְׁמוּאֵ֑ל <WH8050> And Samuel וַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> and the LORD הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not הִפִּ֥יל <WH5307> fall מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all manner דְּבָרָ֖יו <WH1697> was with him and did let none of his words אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> to the ground

וַיֵּ֙דַע֙ <WH3045> knew כָּל־ <WH3605> All יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> And all Israel מִדָּ֖ן <WH1835> from Dan וְעַד־ <WH5704> against בְּאֵ֣ר שָׁ֑בַע <WH884> even to Beersheba כִּ֚י <WH3588> for נֶאֱמָ֣ן <WH539> [was] established שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> that Samuel לְנָבִ֖יא <WH5030> [to be] a prophet לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיֹּ֥סֶף <WH3254> again יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD לְהֵרָאֹ֣ה <WH7200> appeared בְשִׁלֹ֑ה <WH7887> in Shiloh כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because נִגְלָ֨ה <WH1540> revealed יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> for the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁמוּאֵ֛ל <WH8050> himself to Samuel בְּשִׁל֖וֹ <WH7887> in Shiloh בִּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> by the word יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD פ
